shoppingcart.name: Mystery Masterpiece
shoppingcart.description: Montblanc made, over 800 diamonds and three variations involving emeralds, sapphires, and rubies along its body

shoppingcart.name: Taj Mahal Limited Edition
shoppingcart.description: Montblanc made, encrusted with diamonds, sapphires and malachite that all sit on a champagne-tone gold

shoppingcart.name: Meteorite
shoppingcart.description: La Queteur made, high quality black titanium-plated brass components featuring body and cap barrels encrusted with fragments of Campo del Cielo meteorite

shoppingcart.name: Opera Gold
shoppingcart.description: Visconti made, red body with 18k yellow gold finish

shoppingcart.name: La Dona Menagerie
shoppingcart.description: Cartier made, inspired by a gold crocodile necklace from Cartier, who used a similar pattern to create a limited line of expensive pens

shoppingcart.name: Custom Enju Wood
shoppingcart.description: Pilot made, precious japanese pagoda wood, 18-carat gold nib
